doc:
Doug Savant https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doug_Savant 0 Douglas Peter Savant (born June 21, 1964) is an American actor. He played Matt Fielding in Melrose Place (1992–97) and Tom Scavo in the ABC's Desperate Housewives (2004–12). Douglas_Peter_Savant ( born June_21_,_1964 ) is an_American_actor . He played Matt_Fielding in Melrose_Place_(_1992 – 97_) and Tom_Scavo in the_ABC 's_Desperate_Housewives ( 2004 – 12_) .
